Name: COUNTY_CODE
criteria: coverage[, required := FACILITY_TYPE %in% c(1,2) & (F_SYSTEM %in% c(1,2,3,4,5)|(F_SYSTEM == 6 & URBAN_CODE == 99999)|!is.na(NHS))]

Name: IRI
criteria: coverage[, required := FACILITY_TYPE %in% c(1,2) &(F_SYSTEM %in% c(1,2,3) | !is.na(NHS) |(!is.na(expansion_factor) & F_SYSTEM == 4 & URBAN_CODE == 99999)) &SURFACE_TYPE > 1]

Name: PSR
criteria:
coverage[, required := is.na(IRI) & !is.na(expansion_factor) & SURFACE_TYPE > 1 & 
        ((F_SYSTEM %in% c(4, 5, 6) & URBAN_CODE < 99999 & FACILITY_TYPE %in% c(1, 2)) |
            (F_SYSTEM == 5 & FACILITY_TYPE %in% c(1, 2) & URBAN_CODE == 99999))]
